net.lightstone.task
Class PulseTask

java.lang.Object
  net.lightstone.task.Task
      net.lightstone.task.PulseTask

public final class PulseTask
extends Task

A simple Task which calls the SessionRegistry.pulse() and World.pulse() methods every tick.

Author:
Graham Edgecombe
